name: Ghoul
description: A ravenous, undead creature with a gaunt body and long, clawed hands, driven by an insatiable hunger for flesh.
memorable: Its claw attacks can paralyze living enemies, making it a dangerous foe in combat.
goals: To consume raw meat, especially the flesh of the living.
relations: Often found in graveyards or crypts, ghouls can be created from dark magic or as cursed beings.
strengths: Incredibly fast and stealthy, capable of ambushing unsuspecting prey.
weaknesses: Weak to radiant damage which can impair its attack effectiveness.
attacks: Paralyzing claw attack with slashing damage and a bite attack that targets incapacitated creatures.
most_powerful_ability: Paralyzing Claw that incapacitates foes, making them easy targets.
senses: Possesses darkvision, allowing it to see in dim light and total darkness.
skills: Excels at Stealth with a high modifier, allowing it to hide effectively.
additional_information: Loose skin hanging from its skeletal frame
Highly agile, able to climb and scale difficult surfaces with ease
Undead nature grants it immunity to fatigue and poison conditions
Must consume raw meat daily or risk starvation
Can move effortlessly on ceilings and walls
test_queries: ghoul with a hunger for flesh
ravenous creature that craves raw meat
